title: Borderless Fullscreen - Alt + Tab
body: When playing in Borderless Fullscreen window, Alt + Tab eventually refuses to function as a way to "tab" back to desktop. Any idea what may cause this issue?

replies.body: I haven't experienced this issue before, so I can't really say for sure why that's happening.  Alternatively have you tried the 'newer' way to alt tab?  This would be Windows Key + Tab.  Let me know if that helps!
my game constantly experiencing this issue weather i alt tab out off the game at anytime or not

o:
No I haven't!
I'll attempt that when I'm home
Ty for the suggestion!
